remarks: If two hyperplanes are comparable, they are equal.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Oct-2014.)
statement:
lshpcmp.h $e |- H = ( LSHyp ` W ) $.
lshpcmp.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lshpcmp.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. H ) $.
lshpcmp.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. H ) $.
lshpcmp $p |- ( ph -> ( T C_ U <-> T = U ) ) $.
